bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of larger than normal quantities of saliva in the mouth. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry wei ling xian 威靈仙 quotes CYLHSF : 宣通五藏，腹內宿滯，心頭痰水，膀胱宿 膿，口中涎水 , “It passes through the five depots, and [relieves people of] sluggish [food] remaining in the abdomen overnight, of phlegm water [in the chest] on top of the heart, of pus lodging in the bladder, and of saliva water filling the mouth ”.
